the base of body hairs which may involuntarily develop when a person is cold or 
experiences strong emotions such as fear, euphoria or sexual arousal. The 
medical term for the effect is cutis anserina or horripilation. .... A skin condition 
that mimics goose bumps in appearance is keratosis pilaris.
